explains: v. 过高估计（能力、影响或价值）；过高估计（规格、数量、数字等）

sentences.en: If they overestimate, they lose revenue.
sentences.cn: 如果他们过高地估算，就会损失收入。

sentences.en: Twenty-five thousand turned out to be an overestimate.
sentences.cn: 25000这个数字被证实是过高的估计。

sentences.en: While girls lack confidence , boys often overestimate their abilities.
sentences.cn: 女孩通常缺乏自信，而男孩则往往会高估自己的能力。
